{"id":1051807465,"question_id":13,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"9 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1694958088,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1051807465/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Roman to Integer","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int romanToInt(string s) {\n        size_t lastVal=0,currVal=0,total=0;\n        for(size_t i =0 ; i<s.length();++i){\n            switch(s[i]){\n                case 'I':\n                currVal = 1;\n                break;\n                 case 'V':\n                currVal = 5;\n                break;\n                 case 'X':\n                 currVal = 10;\n                break;\n                case 'L':\n                currVal = 50;\n                break;\n                 case 'C':\n                 currVal = 100;\n                break;\n                 case 'D':\n                 currVal = 500;\n                break;\n                 case 'M':\n                 currVal = 1000;\n                break;\n            }\n        if(lastVal < currVal){\n            total += currVal - 2 * lastVal ;\n        }else{\n            total += currVal ;\n        } \n        lastVal = currVal ;\n\n        }\n    return total;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"roman-to-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
